description: The Department of National Defence requires the provision of Cable Realer as per the Statement of Requirements to be delivered to CFB Kingston, Ontario.
full_summary:
================================ smells like text

**Invitation to Tender**
-----------------------------

The Department of National Defence invites ***proposals*** for the provision of cable realer services as per the [attached Statement of Requirements] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/64e5e502eecdb725599d38783788709e/w6369-230333_rfp_eng_004.pdf).

### Solicitation Information
--------------------------------

* **Tender Reference**: PW-22-01007048
* **Solicitation Number**: W6369-230333
* **Publication Date**: 16 September 2022
* **Closing Date**: 14 November 2022, 14:00 Eastern Time

### Service Description
------------------------

The Department of National Defence requires cable realer services to be delivered to CFB Kingston, Ontario. The services must meet the requirements outlined in the [attached Statement of Requirements] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/48b788adbee52470efe0df48ca15808d/w6369-230333_rfp_fr_004.pdf).

### General Information
-------------------------

* **Category**: General Departmental Supply Services (GD)
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

### Contact Information
-------------------------

* **Contracting Authority**: Rachel Desjardins (Rachel.Desjardins@forces.gc.ca) Telephone: 613-290-5359

### Documents
----------------

The following documents are attached to this notice:

* [Statement of Requirements (English)] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/64e5e502eecdb725599d38783788709e/w6369-230333_rfp_eng_004.pdf)
* [Statement of Requirements (French)] (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/16/48b788adbee52470efe0df48ca15808d/w6369-230333_rfp_fr_004.pdf)

Please note that the tender process is open to all qualified suppliers. The successful supplier will be required to meet the requirements outlined in the Statement of Requirements and deliver the cable realer services as per the
